channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Joan Didion leaves one more piece of writing to faithful fans
item.description: Didion's book is an intimate chronicle of the author's struggle to help her daughter, even if it meant digging into her own long-unexamined neuroses.

item.title: Senate Democrats press Hegseth for answers on Trump order to ban transgender troops
item.description: Lawmakers are asking the Defense Secretary to explain how the Pentagon is complying with court rulings blocking President Trump's executive order atte...

item.title: Trump wants a Golden Dome over America. Here's what it would take
item.description: Experts are divided whether a new missile defense system for the U.S., inspired by Israel's Iron Dome, would be worth the cost.

item.title: Public viewing for Pope Francis begins Wednesday ahead of Saturday funeral
item.description: Faithful from around the world are pouring into the Vatican, where Pope Francis' body will go on display Wednesday, ahead of a funeral Saturday.

item.title: Hundreds of scholars say U.S. is swiftly heading toward authoritarianism
item.description: Most — but not all — political scientists are deeply troubled by the president's attempts to expand executive power, according to a national survey.

item.title: Watch: Might the next pope come from Africa?
item.description: The Archbishop of Abuja in Nigeria speaks to the BBC about how the next pontiff could be selected.

item.title: Harvard University sues Trump administration to stop funding freeze
item.description: The lawsuit signals a sharp escalation of a feud between the elite institution and the new presidency.

item.title: 4/21: The Daily Report
item.description: Lindsey Reiser reports on the death of Pope Francis and international reaction, another Signal chat raising concerns about access to sensitive governm...

item.title: Some GOP states are targeting driver’s licenses issued to immigrants illegally in the US
Man missing after rare shark attack in Israel
item.description: Footage posted online shows a swimmer flailing in the distance as beachgoers yell in shock.

item.title: Putin suggests Russia open to direct talks with Ukraine
item.description: The Russian president's proposal is the first signal of bilateral talks since the early days of the war.

item.title: 4/21: America Decides
item.description: Global tributes pour in for Pope Francis; Presidents and lawakers honor Pope Francis' legacy

item.title: NASA images show peanut-shaped asteroid during high-speed flyby
item.description: This asteroid is bigger than scientists anticipated, about 5 miles long and 2 miles wide at its widest point — resembling a deformed peanut.

item.title: Anti-Defamation League says anger at Israel is now the driving force behind antisemitism in the US
item.description: The Anti-Defamation League says the number of antisemitic incidents in the United States reached a record high last year.

item.title: Pope Francis' funeral date set as Vatican shows him lying in coffin
item.description: The Vatican says Pope Francis' funeral will be held on April 26 at St. Peter's Basilica after the pontiff lies in state there for three days.

item.title: Burkina Faso army says it foiled 'major' coup plot
item.description: The plotters, some ex-army officers, hatched the plan in Ivory Coast, the authorities say.

item.title: 4/21: CBS Evening News
item.description: Remembering Pope Francis, the Catholic Church leader who broke with tradition; Pope Francis defied doctors to serve until the very end, aide says

item.title: Drones pose increasing risk to airliners near major US airports
